conbody.p: Use the clause at 252.211-7006 , Passive Radio Frequency Identification, in solicitations and contracts, including solicitations and contracts using FAR part 12 procedures for the acquisition of commercial items, that will require shipment of items meeting the criteria at 211.275-2 , and complete paragraph (b)(1)(ii) of the clause as appropriate.
